name: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
description: To become the greatest band of all time, two slacker, wannabe-rockers set out on a quest to steal a legendary guitar pick that gives its holders incredible guitar skills, from a maximum security Rock and Roll museum.
keywords: lucifer morningstar character,bigfoot character,written by star,guilty pleasure,rock musical

review.author: gregory6689
review.heading: A really good movie but still I'm disappointed!
review.reviewBody: When I first heard that Jack Black and Kyle Gass would make a movie about their band I was freaking out! I love their music and I hoped that this movie would be really funny! Now that I have watched it I can't really say that these hopes weren't satisfied but I think I expected more. The movie is full of Tenacious D's great music and I really loved listening to all of it. There are a lot of great jokes and I just love the story, at least the first bit. I don't like the way the movie ends. The ending is very abrupt and in my opinion they could have extended that a bit more.\n\nOverall I think it is a good movie to watch! Everyone who likes rock music should watch it! It'll give you a good laugh!
